data.actual_result: "You have received an invite to join . ."
data.expected_result: No invite should pop up once you've accepted or declined the invite
data.short_description: the invite bug/glitch happens on stock android discord app on the latest Version.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open browser and get to an invite/code link - Hit join, but make sure you select "I already have the app" - Once the app is opened, hit the join button and just use discord like you usually would. - Select "user settings", turn your device off/on before reconnecting, open the image selector, have a phone alarm pop up on screen - All stated above will trigger it.
